sentences.sContent: Article 33 A book publisher may alter or abridge a work with the permission of the copyright owner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Article 33 A book publisher may alter or abridge a work with the permission of the copyright owner.
sentences.sCn: 第三十三条图书出版者经作者许可，可以对作品修改、删节。

words.tran: 删节；删节本；[图情] 文摘；缩短；限制
缩短；减少；删去（abridge的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to reduce the length of (a written work) by condensing or rewriting
